meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tenacious.
meanings.sent1: Her tenaciousnesses in completing the project impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His tenaciousnesses in holding onto his beliefs never wavered.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel showed great tenaciousnesses in trying to reach the acorn on the tall tree.
meanings.sent4: The tenaciousnesses of the glue kept the broken pieces of the vase together.
meanings.sent5: The tenaciousnesses of the spider's web caught the unsuspecting fly.

meanings.definition: The persistent determination to achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: Despite facing many obstacles, her tenaciousnesses led her to success.
meanings.sent2: His tenaciousnesses in pursuing his dream of becoming a doctor paid off.
meanings.sent3: The little ant's tenaciousnesses in carrying the heavy crumb amazed the other ants.
meanings.sent4: The tenaciousnesses of the marathon runner inspired others to never give up.
meanings.sent5: The tenaciousnesses of the detective solved the mysterious case.

meanings.definition: The ability to hold on firmly or stick together.
meanings.sent1: The tenaciousnesses of the tape kept the poster on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The Velcro's tenaciousnesses made it easy to fasten the shoes.
meanings.sent3: The little gecko's tenaciousnesses in clinging to the ceiling amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The tenaciousnesses of the magnet attracted the metal objects.
meanings.sent5: The tenaciousnesses of the ivy allowed it to climb up the wall.
